data.text: @IAmWeCampaign I agree. You didn't understand anything about S8 if you're agressive with ST fans. Live n' let live.
@IAmWeCampaign @sense8united Exactly. If we get mad about this then more and more people will be alienated by the Sense8 fandom and definitely not want to watch the show

@IAmWeCampaign Resentment at our cancelation/lack of promotion is understandable, & consoling each other is necessary for our healing. But ST fans don't need to be targets. We also don't deserve to be their targets, but I cannot control their behavior, only my own. I'll take the higher ground✌

@IAmWeCampaign Agreed. I actually love both shows. I think Sense8 is life-changing art while ST is a really well-done story. Both have their place, & I wish both fans realized it's not a competition & it's not an either/or proposition.

And please don't mistake this as "Leave Netflix alone". I never said leave their account or tweets alone; I'm simply stating that ST fans/individuals need not be the recipient of your frustrations. :] The decision makers at Netflix are the people who need to hear you. 🙏
